Method.name: translate
Method.Implementation:
#dim lastName As %String set lastName = ##class(ActionMenuUtil).getLastNameMenu( name )
set DisplayName = $case(lastName, "%TestUnitarioContext" : "Testar", ; Do not move, context menu. "%TestUnitario" : "Testar", ; Do not move, main menu. "%TestClass" : "Testar esta classe", "%TestAndCompile" : "Compilar e testar esta classe", "%TestAllClass" : "Testar o suíte completo", "%TestPackage" : "Testar o pacote", "%TestLastTest" : "Rodar o último teste", "%TestClearResult" : "Limpar os resultados dos testes", "%TestClearPopulate" : "Limpar os dados do Populate", "%TestAutomaticOff" : "Desabilitar - Compilar e testar", "%TestAutomaticOn" : "Habilitar - Compilar e testar", :DisplayName)
quit $$$OK
